title: Are We Ready For Some Football?
description: Hot Takedown previews the return of both the NFL and the English Premier League. Then, an interview with author Reid Forgrave.
itunes:author: FiveThirtyEight, 538, Neil Paine, Geoff Foster, Sara Ziegler
